resources.string: Attendance Browser is a tool that can search in attendance system and can identify who is currently in school and who is not also able to track attendance at selected persons and draw attention to the presence of a change in the school for such persons.
Start tracking attendance a man named \"%1$s\"?

If you want to watch a man must have him on the warrant!\n\nClicking agree you acknowledge that you have permission to track attendance using this application from the selected person named \"%1$s\" (hereinafter \"selected person\"), and bear all responsibility for all legal and other problems caused by tracking the selected person.
Are you sere you want to remove \"%1$s\" from tracked?
If you want to track any man, you must by logged in to SAS Manager.
Now you can add Tracking people Widget to your home screen.
Alert me when tracked person leaves or comes to school. (can increase power consummation)
